name: Pineapple Pursuit
description:
Disclaimer: I made this game in two days.

In this game you'll fly around as a pineapple on a schoolbus and try to avoid cookies, crazy marshmellows, and UFO's coming towards you! But worry not, for you have a few items at your disposal, these are a pineapple that gives you an extra life, a fidget spinner that makes all enemies on screen disappear, a Tide Pod that you can throw at enemies to poison them and make them disappear, and your handy dandy Harry Potter Obama 10 backpack to use as a shield!

(Fun fact: You can look left in this game, even though it does absolutely nothing)

Have fun! :D
